page.title: 04Attitudes
page.content:
This is a friendly, enterprising mixed Scottish and English community. Of the latter, most have moved here as the oil industry has offered more business opportunities.
Newcomers are welcomed and readily drawn into the local activities. The pace of life is slow but, with long distances to travel and little public transport, the private car plays a predominant role.
The people here seem relaxed and happy with their lives and work. The Postman stops for a chat, the local farmers help each other and shopping locally is a pleasure.
